engine.util.factory

Class SpriteSheetFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.util.factory.SpriteSheetFactory

  • public class SpriteSheetFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating SpriteSheets.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteSheetFactory(TextureFactory bitmaps)
      Creates a new Sprite Sheet Factory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteSheetFactory

        public SpriteSheetFactory(TextureFactory bitmaps)
        Creates a new Sprite Sheet Factory.
        Parameters:
        bitmaps - The source of textures for the sprite sheets.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public SpriteSheet get(java.lang.String fileName,
              int spritesPerX,
              int spritesPerY,
              int spriteBorderSize,
              int filter)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a new object from the factory. If the desired object already exists, then that object is returned. Otherwise, a new object is created.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of an image file containing the sprites.
        spritesPerX - Number of sprites on the X axis.
        spritesPerY - Number of sprites on the Y axis.
        spriteBorderSize - The number of pixels bordering each sprite on all sides.
        filter - The type of filtering to be used. Should be one of the IRenderDevice.FILTER options. Note that this is only updated if the desired texture hasn't been loaded yet.
        Returns:
        A SpriteSheet matching the specification.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be loaded.
